ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Breadth-first assignment priorities?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wrong.  applySpecialHandling was reducing the priority back to MEDIUM because of the seed redirects.  I have a depth-first heritrix working great now.  I
